channel.title: 317 donator shop Help
channel.description:
hi im trying to add more items to the donator shop. and once i compile it works but when i run the server this pops up.but when i take the three items out of the shop.cfg its fine.Need help.im using demise's pking source as base.
Loaded WorldMap In (73 ms)... Unlimitedpkerz has been activated... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "9 99999999 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:88) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:33) at server.main(server.java:136)
Update:i got the error to go away but the items are not showing up in the shop.

item.title: 317 donator shop Help
item.dc:creator: @saadmboy saadmboy
item.description:
@saadmboy wrote:

^ i think he means try to add or delete a 2 (probably wont work but try anyway)

Read full topic

item.title: 317 donator shop Help
item.dc:creator: @Hulkrule Hulkrule
item.description:
@Hulkrule wrote:

expozee:

this happened to me once when i tried editing my shops, there are “2” there already, and if u delete any of the “2” it will give u this problem(im not 100% sure, but this is how i fixed it, added “2” to the missing slots).

im sorry but i dont under stand exactly what you are saying.could you explain in a little more detail.Sorry to ask i just dont understand.Also i just cant make the items appear in the shop now.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 donator shop Help
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

this happened to me once when i tried editing my shops, there are “2” there already, and if u delete any of the “2” it will give u this problem(im not 100% sure, but this is how i fixed it, added “2” to the missing slots).

Read full topic

item.title: 317 donator shop Help
item.dc:creator: @Hulkrule Hulkrule
item.description:
@Hulkrule wrote:

[quote=“Demon6994, post:12, topic:407963”]shop = 20 Donators_Shop 2 2 9802 1000 9814 1000 9811 1000 9812 1000 9813 1000 9808 1000 9810 1000 9809 1000 9804 1000 9805 1000 9807 1000 9806 1000 13000 1000 13001 1000 13002 1000 13003 1000 642 1000 648 1000

If it still doesn’t work. Go inbetween each and every one of the items you put take out ALL the spaces, and use the ‘Tab’ key.

If it doesn’t work. I suggest learning more Java.

For the Tab key was made for spacing the numbers out. :)[/quote]i already did that.But im not getting the error anymore. the stuff is just not showing up in the shop.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 donator shop Help

@Demon6994 wrote:


If it still doesn't work. Go inbetween each and every one of the items you put take out ALL the spaces, and use the 'Tab' key. :)

If it doesn't work. I suggest learning more Java.

For the Tab key was made for spacing the numbers out. :)

If it still doesn’t work. Go inbetween each and every one of the items you put take out ALL the spaces, and use the ‘Tab’ key.

If it doesn’t work. I suggest learning more Java.

For the Tab key was made for spacing the numbers out.

item.title: 317 donator shop Help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

You messed up in some places.

shop = 20 Donators Shop 2 2 9802 1000 9814 1000 9811 1000 9812 1000 9813 1000 9808 1000 9810 1000 9809 1000 9804 1000 9805 1000 9807 1000 9806 1000 13000 1000 13001 1000 13002 1000 13003 1000 642 1000 648 1000 6522 1000
Before the 9812 you tabbed twice, and before 648. If it still does not work, try deleting 1 of the 9’s.

Read full topic
